subject: Re: [junit] Ant and Junit
msgSnippet: Hi Abhishe, What you have described is not quite clear, In eclipse, you explicitly invoked the test case, and so did you using Ant? Is the build failed because
messageBody:
Hi Abhishe,

What you have described is not quite clear,

In eclipse, you explicitly invoked the test case, and so did you using
Ant? Is the build failed because the Thread.sleep line was not executed
or some other failure?

Could you please elaborate a little more?

Yining

On Tue, 2004-05-18 at 01:09, boyfrnd007 wrote:
> Hi I have written this junit test where one of the tests uses the
> Thread.sleep method to sleep for a while. When I use the eclipse
> plugin to run the test, it seems to be working just fine. But when I
> use the ANT, it says the BUILD failed and it does not execute the
> Thread.sleep line in one of the tests. Does anyone know why is it
> doing that? Any help on this matter would be really appreciated.
> Thanks in advance!
> Abhishek
